Trump claimed to have saved more than: 700 million in the negotiation on the F-35.
The savings with the F: 35 Joint Strike Fighter were already in progress before Trump's involvement.
The F: 35 program was already under scrutiny and concerns were raised about its cost.
Trump: s involvement and pressure on Lockheed Martin led to a $728 million reduction in the F-35 program, resulting in the "lowest priced F-35s in program history."
